name: Stonewake's Cross
description: The first major hub players visit. It gathers all core services in one place: forging, enhancing, runes, potions, tools, selling, and race rerolls â€“ everything needed to build a strong Forger before venturing deeper.

name: Forgotten Kingdom
description: Island Two, once the largest kingdom, now a fallen castle with forgotten memories. Supplying all the core services from forging to enchanting and featuring even more life-threatening quests. Traces of ancient magic still run through its crumbling walls, luring only the bravest to uncover its secrets.
features: Farm crystal ores: Arcane, Blue, Crimson, and more
